CustomField.description: Description of Customer's needs, compelling reasons, plans & decision steps, strategy & expected benefits. Indicate key Customer milestones & timing, e.g., issuance of RFx, short-list selection, rollout dates.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Description of Customer's needs, compelling reasons, plans & decision steps, strategy & expected benefits. Indicate key Customer milestones & timing, e.g., issuance of RFx, short-list selection, rollout dates.
CustomField.label: Customer Request
